channel.title: How do i make my own server?
channel.description: i am having trouble with making my own server. every time i click on the "register your own server" button, it says my server is offline. how do i make my own server so that i can design my own world? someone with experience please reply!!!!

item.title: How do i make my own server?
item.dc:creator: @prickly_needle prickly needle
item.description:
@prickly_needle wrote:

People please calm down. Making fun of board users and server creators less experienced yourselves is surely no sign of maturity, so please keep it to a minimum on the name-calling and picking on.

Hello, you are loking how to create a server? First you must scroll to the top of the server status page and the second link, click there to download moparscape aryan 3.2 webclient onto your computer. Save it to your desktop. Once that is complete, click on the M insigniated icon on your desktop to install it. Once this is complete, click on the moparscape icon and use your server. To register your server, you must first get it online which I am still unsure of how to do myself, but rest assured there are board users who can help you with this.

Remember people, making fun of less experienced users is no way to proceed in life, so please dont insult our board users, thanks.

Hope you get help for this 666

Yours sincerely

~Prickly Needle~

A.K.A. Durial321

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my own server?

item.title: How do i make my own server?
item.dc:creator: @_ownage1 ~ownage~
item.description:
@_ownage1 wrote:

mitchtheblonde:

Your a complete noob. Play on others servers, thne learn how to make your own!

Dude if your going to spam on threads just to get your post’s up do it secretly!!!

And for your question, go to Mod Taharock’s ultimate server guide and if you want to make a server make sure you have a fast computer.
